The Great Email Escape interactive game

Created for Return Path

Game on Return Path's site

Built using PhaserJS

Graphics created by Jonathan Foerster

CAN YOU BREAK OUT OF BAD EMAIL?

Put your email marketing knowledge to the test with the Great Email Escape. In this virtual escape room, you’ll have five minutes to answer ten tricky questions about email. From time zone conundrums to ranking email client usage, this room will cover a wide range of topics to see how much you know about email. Don’t worry, you have more than one chance to answer each question, so stick with it and see if you can get out in time.

 Jonathan Whitney
